title: Tourism Website
description: Created an engaging travel platform with responsive design, featuring images, videos, and carousels of famous destinations. Utilized HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for a seamless user experience.

title: Food Munch
description: Developed a responsive, mobile-first website for browsing a wide range of food items, featuring product videos and seamless navigation. Utilized HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for optimal performance.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: Created a fully responsive website showcasing a wide range of products with detailed information and product videos. User experience and implemented carousels for displaying multiple images of offers.
